item.title: How to write comments in markdown
item.description: How to write comments in markdown I’ve been wanting a way to put comments into some of my markdown documents. I came across this solution today. You can use link labels to achieve it. Example: [comment]: <> (this is how to make a md comment) reference: stackoverflow post
